title: Global scroll-to-top on route navigation/refresh and footer contact info update

requirements.summary: Implement global scroll-to-top behavior on all in-app route navigations and on full page reloads across the TanStack Router app layout.
acceptanceCriteria: From any scroll position on any page, clicking any in-app navigation button/link (e.g., Header menu items, Footer offering/solution buttons) navigates to the new route and the viewport is positioned at the top of the page.
Refreshing/reloading a page while scrolled down results in the viewport loading at the top of the page (not restoring the previous scroll position).
Behavior works on both desktop and mobile viewports across all existing routes in frontend/src/App.tsx.

file_operations.description: Create a small global utility component that listens to TanStack Router location changes and calls window.scrollTo(0, 0); also sets window.history.scrollRestoration = 'manual' and forces an initial scroll-to-top on mount to prevent scroll restoration on refresh/reload.

Wire the new ScrollToTop component into the root Layout so it runs for all existing routes (including navigations triggered from Header/Footer buttons/links) without adding new routes or touching backend/auth hooks.

requirements.summary: Replace the Footer Contact section placeholder values with the provided Head Office, phone, hours, and email in a clean, mobile-responsive format.
acceptanceCriteria: The Footer Contact section no longer shows the placeholder values (info@solarsparkle.com, +1 (555) 123-4567, etc.) and instead shows the provided Head Office location, phone number, hours, and email.
Email is displayed as "official@solarsparkle.in" (lowercase) and matches exactly.
Footer layout remains visually consistent with the existing design and does not overflow or break on small screens.

file_operations.description: Update the Contact list content to use English labels and exactly these values: Head Office: Kanpur, India; Phone: +91 81124 38846; Hours: Mon - Sat, 10 AM - 6 PM; Email: official@solarsparkle.in; keep the existing responsive layout classes and ensure no overflow on small screens.
